ygData.subject: MAKE MONEY
ygData.msgSnippet: saw this on twisters site... Another great tactic for making gobs of money is to go to the ranger camp in lesser faydark. There are about 8 rangers there that
ygData.messageBody:
saw this on twisters site...



Another great tactic for making gobs of money is to go to the ranger
camp in lesser faydark. There are about 8 rangers there that spawn every
5 minutes and are exactly level 25. These rangers drop 2 weapons that
can be sold for 15pp there with max cha. Best thing to do is have a dupe
character waiting there and fill all your inventory up and drop your
bags and relog and sell to the merchant conveniently placed right inside
the hut! ANY high level player around 40-44 can easily wipe out the
entire camp because there's a huge pathing bug there. Seems like lesser
faydark is split into several zones and if you run a few paces towards
the road near the camp the rangers wont follow. Run back toward the hut
wait a few and they run back at ya. I have personally seen level 49 pets
just walk in there and kill the whole camp with some help from the
player though, but for parties or weaker level soloer's using the
pathing exploit is great way to make money. Just saying the rangers are
only 25, have about 700 hp so if youre high one nuke/dot, harmony, lull,
etc. can easily destroy the camp. If you got a good strategy worked out
you can milk the camp real nice. Hope I contributed something. Keep up
the good work.


dont know if u all know....to bad i m low lvled
